channel.title: Hosting your client download w/ no ads
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape Community, I've figured out that all you guys use sites like uppit to host your client download for you with alot of ads so im doing this free program for a while to give you guys an ad-free download (not 100% for uppit :/).
Heres what i can do:- + Add your servers banner to the download page, + 99% no ads + 100% free + I'll do your webhosting if you cant for some reason. [will be given an page on my site.]
How to apply for one:- [code=Application]Server Name: Download Link: Banner Link: Server Webpage/Forums:[/code] [code=MoparScape]At the bottom of every page you will have a link to the Moparscape Forums[/code] (If you need a banner go to Demise's thread for some kewl banners @ [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,430398.0.html][u]here[/u][/url])
[u][b](SERVICE WILL NOT BE DONE TILL I GET CONFIRMATION FROM A STAFF MEMBER)[/b][/u]

ty for telling me
